html:
4.5.22  2:13 pm   my thoughts race and race.  the goldfish and the elephants fight each other in my hippocampus constantly.  my creative ambitions distract me constantly as well.  have you experience something similar?

      yes

4.5.22  1:08 pm   why did the chicken cross the road?

      someone's gotta do it

4.5.22  12:00 pm   so when drawing, you would mirror the drawing to see it from a new perspective and notice the flaws, is there an equivalent method to this in music?.

      just listen to it in a different location, or while doing something different

4.5.22  10:24 am   i'm having a hard time finding music that feels as genuine and expressive as your songs. everything else that i am aware of pales in comparison so i end up not listening to a lot of other music. sometimes i really feel like i should stop paying attention to your art. it feels addicting. it feels like it's getting worse too. i continue to get less and less interested in all the music i thought i liked and can't seem to find anything else that makes me feel that way. what do you do if you find yourself unhealthily obsessed like this??

      you might have to make your own music, which is a huge responsibility if your standards are wicked high, so that means 2 things: 1 you'll have to realize that even i am drastically falling short of anyone's high standards, and, 2, you can realize that every other artist is too. suddenly that leads to a breakthrough, as you realize you actually love everyone

4.5.22  9:42 am   In your video "Hi I'm steve" supposed to mean something? Or is it just a random thing that just came to mind with no reason at all?

      everything means everything. ........ that actually adds up to a lot of possibilities, when you get right down to it

4.5.22  9:01 am   Why is it so cold in the desert

      must be night time

4.5.22  8:35 am   Do things need words to have a conclusion

      no

4.5.22  12:53 am   how do you not get discouraged? how do i not get discouraged?

      the first question is, what would you rather get, instead of discouraged

4.4.22  11:37 pm   do you play all the instruments in your songs?

      yes

4.4.22  10:51 pm   have the natural shape of spheres ever bothered you

      no

4.4.22  10:41 pm   How do you convince someone that love is reasonable

      it's written on the wall. you don't have to convince anyone. they will see it written there

4.4.22  10:39 pm   where is old mexico

      tenochtitlan

4.4.22  10:07 pm   whats your favorite tongue twister?

      toy boat

4.4.22  9:28 pm   is music a good form of therapy?

      yes. unless you work in music professionally, in which case it will remind you of work. HOWEVER, work can be good therapy so then it might still seem like therapy. Or, maybe you've been studying and learning music, in a musical education process. In that case, music will remind you of education........ however, education can be therapy also. so yes music can be therapy, but it might be a different kind therapy if you're someone that happens to have any sort of logistical relationship(s) with music

4.4.22  7:09 pm   what has changed about your video production now compared to when you made "here comes the sun"?

      i've come to my senses

4.4.22  6:26 pm   How to be cool?

      impossible. it can't be done

4.4.22  6:24 pm   how do I stop perceiving things in three bodily dimensions 

      i have no earthly idea

4.4.22  3:56 pm   Is the sombrero in maybe i could eat blades of grass the same one as in 9 8 7?

      yes

4.4.22  3:34 pm   if a stick was infinitely long, and I turned the stick slightly, how fast would it move at the tip of the stick?

      no tip. infinite stick is tipless

4.4.22  3:11 pm   Is you 'erasing' the song at the end of "Here comes the Sun" a metaphor to mean that you were actually dissatisfied with the result? 

      no

4.4.22  3:05 pm   Does perfectionism plague how you make your songs?

      no. perfection doesn't exist, so it's off the table

4.4.22  2:11 pm   why are giraffes Like That

      because trees are... like that

4.4.22  1:41 pm   What do you think about conspiracy theories?

      sometimes it's more fun to get out there and do a brand new conspiracy

4.4.22  1:16 pm   What is the best chord

      F

4.4.22  12:09 pm   can you make a song about aluminum

      i'll consider it

4.4.22  12:06 pm   please replace the first chord in your next song with an AmM7b5, or Adimmaj7.

     i don't think that's a good idea

      and can you put my name, aethralia in it?

     i probably will not do that

      will you put aethralia in it if i ask you for 100 days in a row?

     no

4.4.22  10:15 am   Would you like to exist?

      that sounds lovely

4.4.22  9:35 am   Thanks for all these new songs are you working on a new song right now?

      yes

4.4.22  9:07 am   favorite time signature?

      regular

4.4.22  8:47 am   is it better to focus on technique or feelings when it comes to practicing singing? 

      probably mostly feelings. that's the only way i've found to be effective. the voice is so deeply linked to the feelings (for me), that that's the only possible way i know how to get at it

4.4.22  8:20 am   in 9 8 7, it says "over and over and under and over". is this actually a series of directions? or is it just "over and over and over" with a random "under"? or is it something else?

      it's my best solution to that moment in the song. i tried almost all the other combinations: under and over and under (just 3, starting a bit later), under and over and over, over and under and under and over, .... i tried them all. the one i used was the strongest

4.4.22  8:18 am   how would you explain your song genre to an adult

      i'd place the songs on the internet and hope that one day that adult happens to find them

4.4.22  7:37 am   why does it matter that everything's already been done if that's actually completely untrue because each thing becomes a different thing when done by a different person

      not everything has been done. most things have not been done

4.4.22  7:23 am   How do I make music funny?

      that's easy, just start telling the truth

4.4.22  6:18 am   Did you learn music or are you just talented 

      are you suggesting talented people can't learn music

4.4.22  4:01 am   4 questions

Is there a way possible to become successful in life even though you are still not satisfied? Perfectionist for sure

     yes

     Can a feeling describe a feelings?

     yes, that might be the only way actually

     How to eat a banana bread in a normal way?

     impossible. there is no normal way

     Is there a monkey that can fly without any manmade machines?

      there might be one that can glide, but i'm not sure. i might just be thinking of a squirrel or something

4.4.22  1:06 am   what is the next best thing?

      slightly worse

4.3.22  11:51 pm   how do i stay committed because i'm pathetic and can't do such a thing

      it all depends on what you would like to be committed TO

4.3.22  10:03 pm   where is old hampshire

      southern england

4.3.22  9:56 pm   Why don't you ever use the Capitol building in your answers?

      never been asked about it

4.3.22  8:20 pm   What is your favorite video that you've made?

      i would prefer to make a new one to be my favorite

4.3.22  8:18 pm   how to be not confused

      that's easy, just figure everything out

4.3.22  7:59 pm   hi bill wurtz,
do you do your own mixing?

     yes

     i hold the opinion that whoever is mixing your songs is simply the best at it.

      that's nice of you

4.3.22  7:16 pm   when you build a building, does the mass of the earth increase ☠️

      no

4.3.22  6:48 pm   what happens to the bread in the toaster

      it's toasted

4.3.22  6:39 pm   is there a difference in the implication of the terms "song" and "tune"?

      tune might mean just the melody, and song might include the words, HOWEVER, at some point in the past century it became cool for musicians to say 'tune' when they mean song, so that would make them the same

4.3.22  5:16 pm   Will you ever make a song about cake?

      all options are on the table

4.3.22  3:55 pm   Why dont you ever use capitals

      i do, but i can understand that it may appear that way if you are paying little to no attention whatsoever

4.3.22  1:32 pm   what are some of the factors of a groovy name

      context,

4.3.22  11:06 am   Dude, i had a math exam, and i had 9,8,7 stuck in my head for the whole exam.

     ah, nice, the curse that has affected me for about 3 years now has finally been passed on to others

     But it didnt hinderme from doing well, actually i think it helped me o keep a steady beat going from question after question. so thank you
Are you good at math?

     sure

     then whats 0/0?

      didn't happen
